summary: background Respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), human Rhinovirus (HRV) and human Metapneumo Virus (HMPV) are important viral pathogens causing acute respiratory tract infections in the hospitalized patients. additional file Additional file 1: (142.5KB, doc) The sequence results of RSV. (DOC 142 kb) Additional file 2: (212KB, doc) The sequence results of HRV.
